TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartTransformerCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

remarks.format: ## Remarks The WebPartTransformerCollection class is a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects, typically used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object to manage a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects for a connection. The transformers related to a Web Parts connection can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A> property.
